isosensitivity: ISO 125-1600; ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
othershootingmodes1: Back Light; Beach; Black and White Copy; Close Up; Dusk/Dawn; Easy Panorama; Fireworks Show; Food; Landscape; Night Landscape; Night Portrait; Party/Indoor; Portrait; Snow; Sports; Sunset
imagestabilization: Combination of lens-shift and Electronic VR (still pictures)
otherincameraeffects: Border; Crop; D-Lighting; Filter Effects; Quick Retouch; Rotate Image; Skin Softening; Small Pic
moviefileformats: MOV (Video: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264; Audio: LPCM stereo)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50cm to infinity; [T]: Approx. 1.5m to infinity; Macro close-up mode: [W]: Approx. 2cm to infinity
lcdmonitor: TFT-LCD (touch panel) with Anti-reflection Coating; Touch Screen Control
exposurecompensation: Programmed auto exposure; Exposure compensation (-2.0 to +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
